title: 413. Who Gets the Ventilator?
description: Should a nurse or doctor who gets sick treating Covid-19 patients have priority access to a potentially life-saving healthcare device? Americans aren’t used to rationing in medicine, but it’s time to think about it. We consult a lung specialist, a bioethicist, and (of course) an economist.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
